sentences.chinese: 她甚至可能会养一只宠物鸟。

sentences.english: Both owners and pets in the dog-walking group had lost weight.
sentences.chinese: 遛狗那组的主人和宠物们都瘦了一些。

sentences.english: Correlation analysis showed there was relationship between pet owning and health.
sentences.chinese: 相关分析表明，是否拥有宠物犬与身心健康显著相关。

sentences.english: They take a day of sick leave rather than admit to being off because of pet bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 他们宁可请病假而不愿承认因为痛失宠物而请假。

sentences.english: Pot- bellied pigs make the best pets.
sentences.chinese: 大肚皮猪是最好的宠物。

sentences.english: Fang is Hagrid's pet and companion.
sentences.chinese: 牙牙是海格的宠物，也是伙伴。

sentences.english: Our company is specialized in the production of pet collar , traction with the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家专业生产宠物项圈，牵引带的企业。

sentences.english: You can even drag them from the Call Pet flyout.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以从召唤宠物图标里拉它们出来。

sentences.english: Is Medvedev the lapdog of Putin?
sentences.chinese: 梅德韦德夫是普京的小宠物吗？

sentences.english: The respec cost for hunter pets is being removed.
sentences.chinese: 猎人宠物的洗点免费了。

sentences.english: Chinese Hamsters were introduced into the UK pet market in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 二十世纪六十年代被引进到英国宠物市场。

sentences.english: Pete was upset when his pet bird died.
sentences.chinese: 当皮特的宠物鸟死掉时，他心烦意乱。

sentences.english: Traders in pet markets in Shenyang experienced the same conditions as Chen.
sentences.chinese: 和陈琦一样无奈的还有沈阳市宠物市场的摊主们。

sentences.english: Yes I lost my pet cat yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，夜儿我的宠物猫丢了。

sentences.english: I am a F. 5 student who is so fond of keeping pets.
sentences.chinese: 本人是一名中五学生，从小对饲养宠物有浓厚兴趣。

sentences.english: "Our priority is the pets," Binder said.
sentences.chinese: “宠物是我们的头等大事，”宾得说。

definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
(neologism) (coll.) pet owner (lit. "official in charge of cleaning up poop")
